term.title: electron-deficient bond

item.text: A single bond between adjacent atoms that is formed by less than two electrons, as in B2H6: [image: Not defined] The B–H–B bonds are called a 'two-electron three-centre bonds'.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1110 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
